details.top:
Sa'd (radhi-yAllaahu 'anhu) said: We were sitting with the Messenger of Allaah (sal-Allaahu 'alayhe wa sallam), and he said:

Are any of you unable to gain a thousand good deeds each day?

Somebody then asked him (sal-Allaahu 'alayhe wa sallam):
How does one achieve a thousand good deeds?

He replied: He should say:
details.bottom: ...one hundred times, for a thousand good deeds are recorded for him or a thousand bad deeds are wiped away.
